name: Infinity Looper 2
details:
Double LooperPigtronix Infinity Looper 2 
Stereo looper with 2 independent loops of very low latency
24bit/44 kHz recording 
USB port for saving loops and uploading audio files
5 min loop time
Controls:
Decay, Volume, button: Stop, Once, Octave, Undo, 
Footswitches: Loop 1 and Loop 2
Connectors: 2x In (1/4" jack), 2x Output (1/4" jack), footswitch connector (1/4" jack)
Dimensions: 11.4 x 6.60 x 3.30 cm (4,5" x 2,6" x 1,3"), 
Power supply: 9 V DC 100 mA
https://pigtronix.com/product/infinity-looper-2/
